attributes.additional_details: Tighter restrictions. Entry only to those with desirable skills and speaking good English . No benefits, free NHS, or right to housing without 5 years contributions. Stop benefit payments to people not resident in UK. No automatic right of entry to family members - it is possible for them to live together elsewhere. Enforced removal following any criminal conviction irrespective of family status, family can follow if they need to be together. Support English tradition and culture, stop bowing to ethnic pressure groups.
